title: !!!!!!!!!! BEING A COUPLE RP OFF !!!!!!!!!!
body: I think everyone has experienced the feeling when they gift someone or buy a champion with rp AND THEY ARE 1-10 RP OFF. my fix is to introduce a system where you watch videos or register for websites and buy stuff and you get rp, like how  smite does it with gems a video is 1 rp and registering for a website would be 5 so on and so on, just so you dont have to forkout more money for a couple rp.

replies.body:
You need to post a drawing of something LoL related to get it too I think.

Don’t worry though, they actually don’t judge the drawing’s quality so it can be the most shttiest MS Paint drawing and they’ll still give you it.

Has to be through Riot Support though
send a ticket to support, they are usually willing to give upto 15 free rp of your just short if that champion or skin you've been dreaming of
